src:
Huda nesreča: voznik, ki je vozil pod vplivom alkohola, zakrivil nesrečo
Nastalo je za dva tisoč evrov materialne škode.
03 Nov 2019, 12:07 by A. L.
ČRENŠOVCI – V soboto ob 15.50 so policiste obvestili o prometni nesreči v naselju Črenšovci.Na kraju so ugotovili, da je voznik osebnega avtomobila zaradi neprimerne hitrosti in vožnje pod vplivom alkohola trčil v vozilo, ki je vozilo pred njim.Pri tem se je ena oseba huje poškodovala, ena pa lažje.Nastalo je za dva tisoč evrov materialne škode.Povzročitelj je vozil brez veljavnega vozniškega dovoljenja. Kazensko ga bodo ovadili, poroča PU Murska Sobota.
text:
Severe accident: An alcoholic driver blamed the accident
Two thousand euros of material damage were incurred.
03 Nov 2019, 12:07 by A.L.
ČRENŠOVCI - On Saturday at 3.50 pm police officers were notified of a car accident in the Crensovci settlement. At the scene, the driver of a passenger car collided with a vehicle in front of him due to improper speed and alcohol-induced driving. seriously injured and one more easily. There was a material damage of two thousand euros. The driver was driving without a valid driver's license. They will prosecute him, Murska Sobota Police Department reports.
